name: Lyra Moonwhisper
long_description: Lyra is a young woman in her early twenties, dressed in simple gray apprentice robes adorned with silver trim. Her auburn hair is tied back in a practical ponytail, though a few strands have escaped to frame her face. She carries a well-worn spellbook under one arm and a wand made of ash wood in her other hand. Her green eyes sparkle with enthusiasm and curiosity about magic. Scorch marks on her sleeves and a few singed spots on her robes suggest she's still learning to control her spells. Despite this, she seems eager and determined to master the arcane arts.

dialogue.greeting: Oh, hello! Are you interested in magic too? I'm studying under Eldrin - he's an amazing teacher! His shop is just to the west if you're looking for spell scrolls.
dialogue.default: I've been practicing my spellwork all morning. Did you know that the key to a good fireball is visualization? Well... that and not setting yourself on fire. I'm still working on that second part. *nervous laugh*
dialogue.goodbye: May your spells never backfire! ...Unlike mine sometimes do. Safe travels!
